magicbricks - SEO Head / Lead SEO

Location - Noida and Bangalore, Work Type: Full Time

Product July 01, 2022

Job Roles and Responsibilities:

The Head of SEO?Lead SEO is responsible for the SEO strategy formulation, tasked with the improvement of the business site visibility and raising the organic search rankings, the Head of SEO will also be responsible for the creation, implementation, and analysis of SEO programs and campaigns.

What will you deliver ? :

  • Create, communicate and execute an effective Traffic Acquisition strategy that will significantly increase organic search traffic.
  • Identify & monitor traffic acquisition KPIs. Take ownership and build out the toolset for SEO and SEM traffic analytics.
  • Be creative & data driven. Compile and present traffic reports and clearly show the effects of your activities in the data.
  • Utilize and manage SEM campaigns where significant ROI can be delivered.
  • Convince, and work closely with product managers, Engineers and Content writer to ensure that they understand the importance of SEO & SEM traffic, and how to correctly implement opportunities for traffic acquisition and measurement.
  • Keep abreast of industry trends, contemporary practices in SEO, and Google algorithm updates. Understand the implications for our business and take action to quickly seize opportunity and reduce risk.

What you should be known for:

  • Must have a proven track record of delivering high growth in SEO traffic for a business operating at scale.
  • 12 – 16 for SEO Head and about 10 years for SEO Lead experience in managing SEO.
  • Proven experience of leading SEO & SEM strategy and projects to successfully build audiences for global-scale, products and services.
  • In-depth technical understanding of web and mobile SEO challenges and solutions.
  • Expert user of Google Analytics and Google Web Master Tools and at least one market leading tool for tracking user activity on web sites and mobile apps for SEO/SEM.
  • Experienced trouble-shooter and user of relevant diagnostic tools.
  • An Engineering background with strong HTML, JavaScript & MS Excel skills.
Apply
